The Rise of Hybrid Work in SMBs

1. Flexibility Without Commitment

Features to Look for in Copiers for Hybrid SMBs

When choosing a rental copier for a hybrid team, consider the following features:

  • Cloud printing support (Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox)

  • Scan-to-email or network folder functionality

  • Secure PIN or badge printing to protect sensitive data

  • Compact or multifunction designs that save space

  • Remote monitoring and troubleshooting

Addressing Security Concerns

With remote employees handling sensitive documents, copier security is more important than ever.

  • Use user authentication and access controls to prevent unauthorized use.

  • Enable data encryption on all scanned or emailed documents.

  • Make sure your rental copier automatically clears stored data after each use or at scheduled intervals.

Proper use and tracking are essential in hybrid offices. Here are tips:
